p: It has been documented that sometimes different enantiomers may present dissimilar biological activities [ 33]. In our essential oil, the enantiomeric excess of (+)-β-pinene was 73.8% with respect to (–)-β-pinene. Some studies have shown that the positive enantiomer has antimicrobial activity against Candida albicans, Cryptococcus neoformans, Rhyzopus oryzae, and methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) [ 34]. In contrast, the negative enantiomer exhibits antiviral properties against infectious bronchitis virus (IBV) [ 35].
